Everything is set on Earth. To view the characters and and any other info check out the RPGs wiki website @ http://wikihost.org/wikis/nbwrpg_wiki/wiki/start

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:                               Should we post our character sheets somewhere? and is
 there a repository of sheets I can look at see who is
 what and where ... would not want to duplicate
 someone's character, or take one that is already
 taken. 
 
 And I gather most of the scenes here are on earth or
 Cybertron, or some of both?
 
 --- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 
 > Well the most common way is post for your character
 > arriving on Past-Earth after coming through the
 > Trans-Warp rift by a small ship or in a alt mode.
 > The scenario is free for you to come up with along
 > with you characters back story.
 > 
 > On a side note: In this RPG in the TFs contemporary
 > time, roughly 4,000,300 years in the future from the
 > "Past-Earth" NBW is set, Cybertron has broken out in
 > a 3rd Great War between the Maximals and Predacons
 > as well as Maximals vs. G2 Decepticons on
 > contemporary/future Earth. You can use those facts
 > in your back story if you want. Hope that all makes
 > sense.
 > 
 > Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:     
 >                          Hello,
 >  
 >  Thanks for the greetings! How would I intro a new
 >  character into the games? :)
 >  
 >  --- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >  
 >  > Welcome to NBW... we got fun and games...
 >  > 
 >  > xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:     
 >   
 >  >                       supercyclonus!!!!!
 >  >  
 >  >  our new member :D
 >  >  
 >  >
